japanese: 上杉さん、釣れましたか？
translation: Uesugi-san, have you caught any?

japanese: いや……。
translation: No...

japanese: なかなか釣れませんねぇ。
translation: It's pretty hard to catch fish, isn't it?

japanese: 釣りとはこういうもんだろ。
translation: Well, this is what fishing is, right?

japanese:
自然と一体になりつつ、静かに待つ。
そして魚との駆け引きを楽しむ……。
それが釣りの醍醐味。
translation:
Be one with nature, wait quietly,
and enjoy bargaining with the fish...
That's the real thrill of fishing.

japanese:
竿の先端の揺れ、水面の状態、そして海鳥の動き……
すべてを読み切った者が勝つんだ。
translation:
The sway of the rod tip, the condition of the
water's surface, and the movement of the seabirds...
Taking it all in is what it's all about.

japanese:
読み切る、ですか？
私には難しいかもしれませんけど、
どうやるんでしょう？
translation:
Taking in things?
That might be a little difficult for me,
how do I do it?

japanese:
まず、魚が餌に食いついた手応えを感じても
まだ竿は上げるな。
translation:
First of all,
even if you feel the fish bite into the bait,
don't raise the rod yet.

japanese:
やつらは狡猾だ。
餌の隅っこを食べているだけで
本命の針にはたどり着いてない。
translation:
They're cunning.
They'll just eat little bits of the bait,
never reaching the end of the hook.

japanese:
やつらが警戒を解き、
針ごと餌に食らいついたときに――
竿を引き上げる！
translation:
When they let their guard down
and bite the hook along with the bait%p-2;――
%p;that's when you pull up the rod!

japanese: ほうほう、なるほど！
translation: Oh-hoo, I see!

japanese:
む？　むむむっ！！
竿に振動を感じます。
これは……来たかもしれませんよ！
translation:
Hmm? Hmmmmmhh!!
I feel some vibrations in the rod.
I...might have gotten a bite!

japanese: わかってるな、四葉！
translation: You get it, Yotsuba!

japanese:
はい、まだ竿は上げません！
左フェイント！！
translation:
Yeah, I won't raise the rod yet!
A feint to the left!

japanese: なっ！？
translation: Wha?!

japanese: そして右フェイント！！
translation: And a feint to the right!

japanese:
おい！
そんな竿を振ったら魚が逃げちまうぞ！
translation:
Hey!
If you move the rod around that much,
the fish'll escape!

japanese: そして、今です！
translation: And, NOW!

japanese: やったぁ！　お魚ゲットです！
translation: YAY! I got a fish!

japanese: （えー……なんでだ……）
translation: (Huh...how...?)

japanese:
上杉さん！
ナイスなアドバイス、ありがとうございます！
translation:
Uesugi-san!
Nice advice! Thank you so much!

japanese: あ、ああ、よかったな。
translation: Y-yeah, that was great.

japanese: よーし、じゃんじゃん釣っちゃいますよー！
translation: Alright, time to keep catching 'em!

japanese: またまたゲットです！！
translation: I got another one!!

japanese:
（あれから、かなり個性的な釣り方で
　バンバン魚をゲットしてやがる……）
translation:
(Since then, she's been catching fish after fish
 with a pretty unique fishing method...)

japanese:
（最初は無茶苦茶すぎると思ったが、
　ルアーのように、餌が生きているような動きを
　してるから食いつきがいいのかもしれないな）
translation:
(At first I thought it was way absurd,
 but her movements that make the bait
 seem alive, like a lure, get her some good bites.)

japanese: 上杉さん！　今日は大漁ですね！
translation: Uesugi-san! We brought in a great haul today!

japanese:
そうだな……。
俺はまだ釣れてないけどな……ははは……。
translation:
That's right...
Even though I didn't get any...hahaha...
